Package it.unisa.thespoon.model.dao

Interface RistoranteDAO

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Ristorante,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Ristorante,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Ristorante,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Ristorante,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Ristorante,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Ristorante>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Ristorante,Integer>
public interface RistoranteDAO extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Ristorante,Integer>
Author:
Jacopo Gennaro Esposito Interfaccia che rappresenta il DAO di un Ristorante

  • Method Details

    • findRistoranteByOwners

      @Query(value="SELECT r.id_ristorante, r.Nome, r.Via, r.N_Civico, r.Cap, r.Provincia, r.Telefono FROM Ristorante r JOIN Possiede p on p.id_ristorante = r.id_ristorante where p.id = ?", nativeQuery=true) Optional<Set<Ristorante>> findRistoranteByOwners(Integer idRistoratore)

    • findByIdAndAndOwnersID

      @Query(value="SELECT r.id_ristorante, r.Nome, r.Via, r.N_Civico, r.Cap, r.Provincia, r.Telefono FROM Ristorante r JOIN Possiede p on p.id_ristorante = r.id_ristorante where r.id_ristorante = ? and p.id = ?", nativeQuery=true) Optional<Ristorante> findByIdAndAndOwnersID(Integer idRistorante, Integer idRistoratore)

    • findRistoranteByNomeAndVia

      @Query(value="SELECT * FROM ristorante r\nWHERE\n (MATCH(Nome) AGAINST(:Nome IN BOOLEAN MODE) OR :Nome IS NULL)\n AND (r.Via = COALESCE(:Via, r.Via))\n AND (r.N_Civico = COALESCE(:NCivico, r.N_Civico))\n AND (r.Provincia = COALESCE(:Provincia, r.Provincia))\n AND (r.Cap = COALESCE(:Cap, r.Cap));", nativeQuery=true) Optional<Set<Ristorante>> findRistoranteByNomeAndVia(String Nome, String Via, String NCivico, String Provincia, Integer Cap)
